text: 102.5 Sunrise Gold FM is an FM station owned by Polytechnic Foundation of Cotabato & Asia and operated by Kalayaan Broadcasting System. The studio is located in Capitol Hills, Mati City.SPG with Lumon GudingRD Bellido promotes OWWA programs and services in Davao Oriental through radio guesting ==References== Category:Radio stations established in 2008
title: DXOR
